user_query: I'm starting a new diet and I need some information about different dietary restrictions and allergies. Can you provide me with a list of user diets and allergies along with their descriptions? I would also like to know the different tags and categories in which recipes are grouped together. Additionally, please provide me with the USDA Plant Hardiness Zone for my zip code 90210.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of different dietary restrictions and allergies along with their descriptions.
Get a list of tags and categories in which recipes are grouped together.
Query the USDA Plant Hardiness Zone for the zip code 90210.
